statements: SELECT * FROM HumanRightsViolations WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT violation_type, victim_name, location FROM HumanRightsViolations WHERE date_reported >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT victim_name, violation_type FROM HumanRightsViolations WHERE location = 'Syria' ORDER BY date_reported DESC;
SELECT report_id, victim_name, location FROM HumanRightsViolations WHERE violation_type LIKE '%torture%';
SELECT * FROM HumanRightsViolations ORDER BY location, date_reported DESC;
SELECT * FROM HumanRightsViolations WHERE violation_type = 'Extrajudicial Killing';
SELECT report_id, victim_name FROM HumanRightsViolations WHERE date_reported >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY date_reported DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT violation_type FROM HumanRightsViolations WHERE location LIKE '%prison%';
SELECT * FROM HumanRightsViolations WHERE victim_name <> 'Unknown' ORDER BY location ASC, date_reported DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports, location FROM HumanRightsViolations GROUP BY location HAVING total_reports > 5 ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
SELECT * FROM HumanRightsViolations;
SELECT violation_type, location, report_date FROM HumanRightsViolations WHERE victim_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT violation_id, location, description FROM HumanRightsViolations ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ViolationReports WHERE reporter_name = 'Alice Smith';
SELECT report_id, report_date, violation_id, reporter_name FROM ViolationReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM HumanRightsViolations WHERE location = 'Syria' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT violation_id, violation_type, victim_name FROM HumanRightsViolations WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT violation_id, location, description FROM HumanRightsViolations WHERE violation_type = 'Torture' AND location LIKE '%prison%';
SELECT r.report_id, r.report_date, h.violation_type FROM ViolationReports r JOIN HumanRightsViolations h ON r.violation_id = h.violation_id WHERE h.report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(LENGTH(description)) AS avg_description_length, violation_type FROM HumanRightsViolations GROUP BY violation_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY avg_description_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM human_rights_violations;
SELECT id, violation_type, victim_name, location, date FROM human_rights_violations WHERE violation_type='Torture';
SELECT victim_name, location, date, violation_type FROM human_rights_violations WHERE location = 'Syria';
SELECT id, violation_type, victim_name, location FROM human_rights_violations WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM human_rights_violations;
SELECT violation_type, victim_name, location FROM human_rights_violations ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM reports;
SELECT org_name, country, contact_email FROM organizations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT h.violation_type, r.reporter_name, r.report_date, r.description FROM human_rights_violations h JOIN reports r ON h.id = r.violation_id;
SELECT * FROM human_rights_violations;
SELECT violation_id, location FROM human_rights_violations WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM victims WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT perpetrator_id, name FROM perpetrators ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT report_id, reporter, report_description FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM human_rights_violations ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT description, location FROM human_rights_violations WHERE location='Syria';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM victims WHERE age > 18 AND gender='Female';
SELECT name, organization FROM perpetrators WHERE organization='Government' OR organization='Rebel Group';
SELECT report_id, violation_id, reporter, report_date FROM reports ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM HumanRightsViolations WHERE location = 'Syria';
SELECT id, date, location FROM HumanRightsViolations WHERE violation_type = 'Torture' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT description FROM HumanRightsViolations WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Victims WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT name, affiliation, role FROM Perpetrators WHERE violation_id = 3;
SELECT description, violation_type, location FROM HumanRightsViolations;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Victims ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, affiliation, role FROM Perpetrators WHERE role = 'Leader';
SELECT statement, name FROM Witnesses WHERE LENGTH(statement) > 100;
SELECT date, report_text FROM Reports WHERE reporter_id = 123;
